text: The 2019–20 Southside Flyers season is the 28th season for the franchise in the Women's National Basketball League (WNBL). 2019–20 will be their first season as the Southside Flyers, concluding 27 seasons as the Dandenong Rangers. ==Roster== ==Standings== ==Results== ===Pre-season=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center; width: 90%; margin:1em auto;" |- !
